website_summaries.verdict: Lives up to the name in some regards – lightweight and inexpensive, but it's not suited for professional-level work.
pros: Highly portable, easy to set up, and very affordable
Ideal for amateur projects for consumers who don't want to invest a lot of money
cons: Not compatible with all cameras and devices
Has some plastic parts that don't feel very durable

customer_reviews.title: Best $100 I spent all year! Great ROI!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! Just finished using it today for the first time for a client. I didn't have the remote so stopping and starting was a bit of a hassle. Also, $11.99 for the full app? It was worth it though because I had complete peace of mind with my shoot. Hooked it up to my GH4, size 58m lens (12-35). You do have to punch in a little to get around the vingnette, but I was doing that anyway to create a little bokeh. Anyway, great product, worked well with my iPhone 6+...just adjust the font size to client's liking. For $100, you're getting every $ worth.
customer_reviews.author: Rogers Williams

customer_reviews.title: Won't work with wide angle lenses...
customer_reviews.text: I film youtube videos relatively close-up with a wide angle lens that way I can still reach out and pull focus when necessary and stay close to my shoe-mounted mic. I use a 24mm full frame lens and the edges of this box actually vignette. Nowhere is it advertised that it only works with certain lenses of specific focal lengths so it caught me by surprise. So the only option is to use a 35mm lens or longer, nothing wider than a 35mm will work, just be aware of that when you buy it. Unfortunately for me that didn't work so I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Grayson

customer_reviews.title: Great product, however customer support is questionable
customer_reviews.text: Great product, had it for a year.. however customer support is null. I ended up misplacing some of the rings that I primarily use for my lenses and I've written customer support twice and haven't heard back. I was hoping I could buy all the rings separately... but I haven't had any luck finding them.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Veiga

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Great little teleprompter. I do not use the Parrot teleprompter app with it, but went for another I found on the play store I liked better. The beam splitting glass in the teleprompter is good quality and not at all visible in my recordings. Some have noted that phones slip out of the holder easily but I have not had a problem with my rubberized phone case.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Great teleprompter, easy to use and you can't tell a teleprompter is being used.
customer_reviews.text: wow, this simple but affective device really helped me sound less like a bumbling idiot in my videos. I find it very easy to dictate what I want to say, and then make slight tweaks to the text. Then put my phone in it and control with the parrot remote (HIGHLY RECOMMEND YOU GET THAT). You absolutely can not tell that I am reading from a teleprompter, I think because the text is essentially right within frame. Bigger teleprompters have the text going to far left or right of the lens/frame and you can see eye movement. Granted this is not for a far away use, but I find it perfect for YouTube like videos
customer_reviews.author: Chris M. Christian

customer_reviews.title: For the YouTubers. A must have if you use scripts.
customer_reviews.text: Having a YouTube channel this thing is invaluable. I've literally cut my editing down drastically. What took me thirty minutes of shooting I can now do in 5 minutes by having my script right in front of me. Only issue I see is build quality is a bit on the cheapish side. The plastic feels a bit thin. But for under $100 I can deal. If your concerned it'll effect your image while filming. Don't be. You can't even tell it's there. And text is very sharp and easily readable. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: SpareChange

customer_reviews.title: More than what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This product is AMAZING, I am news person, and I am used to the promoters at the station, they are big and it looks like you are reading. This one has the perfect size, it doesn't look like you are reading. You can see it perfectly from the distance. The remote is very handy. you Play, Pause, Forward etc. so you read at your own pace. The app is very easy to use. It syncs ups really fast. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michel Cros

customer_reviews.title: WOW! Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! This is AWESOME! I called 9 companies to try and rent a teleprompter --- with no luck. I ordered this and was thrilled that it arrived the night before I needed it! (THANK YOU AMAZON GUARANTEE!!!) I downloaded the app so I could practice the timing and it all came together for our Saturday project. The remote is a MUST! Even with 3 days of rehearsal - when I actually filmed the project, I had to stop and start it 2 times. It's very easy to load the script, adjust font size, and scrolling speed! Very impressed with the quality of this portable teleprompter! THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Tigger82

customer_reviews.title: This is the best investment I have done in a long time
customer_reviews.text: This is the best investment I have done in a long time. It made shooting my sales videos a lot easier than ever before and now I can talk into the camera without looking like I am reading. It fit perfectly to the camera and the app was easy to use. You still have to practice your reading and take time to find the correct text speed /flow etc, but once that is hacked the filming got perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Silje Tuxen Thingvoll

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I use it daily when doing product videos for work. Everything is crystal clear with the glass. The crazy thing is that when I'm forgetful to turn notifications off when I'm filming, a notification will pop up so I have to stop, but it doesn't show up when I look back through the camera footage. I definitely wasn't expecting that! It's lightweight, easy to use, and does exactly what it's supposed to do!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Great product but difficult to load my script to the Parrot app
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product for the money. I had lots of difficulty loading my script from Word to the Parrot app which uses .txt format. The sync with Drop box did not work, so I had to ask customer service for help. Within 2 days I got advice to simply copy/paste which worked beautifully. However, there is no way to save paragraph breaks when it converts to .txt format, so I added a couple dashes before each paragraph, so that I can recognize that a new paragraph is starting in the teleprompter.
customer_reviews.author: Marcel

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been in need for something compact and easy to use for video recording. And although this product seems like it would meet those needs. This product lacks a solid build and ease of use by a long shot. Nearly the entire product is plastic which makes the attachment for phone flimsy and unsafe for devices without a case. Which is basically anyone looking to use it, considering how small the opening is for you to put your phone in. Overall, this product missed the mark in many areas for me as a videographer for many years. For it’s price this product is robbery towards anyone looking for a product of any decent value.
customer_reviews.author: calvin simon

customer_reviews.title: Great Features, Great Price, Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: I've worked in television for 15 years now. Even with the progress that has been made with price drops on teleprompter, this thing still represents a significant value. Used it for the first time today, and between ease of use and affordability, it's a must have for anyone who does any kind of on-camera presentation - whether you're a YouTuber or a network news reporter. The one drawback - it's significantly more cumbersome to use without the remote, and the remote is sold separately. They should just raise the price and include the remote, or make it more obvious that you need it. Not including the remote required me to make an extra emergency run to B&H Photo.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew F.

customer_reviews.title: Best $100 I've spent
customer_reviews.text: One of those very few occasions when you buy something and it's exactly as described. The attachment supplied fit my camera perfectly. I was using it within a few minutes of opening the box. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job really well
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little device which works really well with a variety of teleprompter software. I'm using it with a Canon camcorder and a 43-52 mm step up ring and it works well on the Amazon Basics tripod. The remote was not such good value for money and I think that controlling the speed with software that does voice tracking such as PromptSmart is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Rob 2037

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Vloggers
customer_reviews.text: Hard to complain about any teleprompter at this price. Of course, the screen is small, so this thing is useful mainly to vloggers or someone working close to the camera. That said, it is completely practical for walk and talk work, the kind of thing you see with a handheld rig on a Gorillapod.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Grizzle

customer_reviews.title: Nice and portable teleprompter
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, and with the app works as espected. I have to use another tripod to prevent the fall of the cellphone. But work as expected, clear display. I use with aand
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Uribe

customer_reviews.title: Saves Editing Time
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it is excellent. Makes it seem like I actually know what I'm saying. Potential Cons: It is somewhat small. In my case of using an 18-105mm lens, I had to zoom in a bit. Also, be careful about the phone placement. I did not have this problem, but if your phone is not securely situated in the teleprompter, it could fall.
customer_reviews.author: IAN R STEPHENSON

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an amateur YouTuber, and I quickly learned that a teleprompter is a necessary investment for making better-quality content. I bought this for my Panasonic Lumix, and it works perfectly. It fits well, was easy to install, and the app is simple and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Easy to see and easy to read. Comfortably holds an iphone 8 in a case. My only complaint, which is minor, is the rings spin a little too freely on the lens/parrot. It would be nice if there was a way to tighten it. I'd recommend getting the upgraded version with the remote because it's pain trying to operate a mirrored phone if you need to start/restart/fastfroward the script.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've been traveling a lot the last two years and I have to keep uploading videos to my Youtube Channel. This teleprompter it's perfect for me, I can travel with it without problems and record my videos without having to memorize the script or improvise. Fits perfect with their remote controller or buying an app with voice detection to scroll automatically when you talk.
customer_reviews.author: Jordi Cor

customer_reviews.title: Great for YouTube videos if you have to read a script.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Text is clear to read 3 metres away if needed. Easy to setup and fits my DSLR with one of the supplied rings. My 18-55 zoom works ok with it but at 18mm can see the edges of the device. Just need to zoom in a little to 20mm or so. I have a short memory so helps me get information across with less stress and fuss.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with expensive Camcorders.
customer_reviews.text: The app is pretty awful. This also doesn't connect to cameras that have built in handles with xlr inputs so you can only mount this onto DSLR cameras unless your camcorder has the mic input taken off.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. The only thing that is hard is when you are more then a few feet away it is hard to see. There has also been times it didn't pickup what I was saying due to no speaking clear enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product!
customer_reviews.text: They send me a telepronter that didnt work. On top of that it was open and had animal hair all over. I needed it as soon as possible and not only did they send me a bad product but they also wasted my time. If i could give them below 1 star would.
customer_reviews.author: johnny

customer_reviews.title: Don’t trust this with a cell phone
customer_reviews.text: The idea is great. Seems flimsy and I don’t feel secure having my cell phone placed on this. I do not feel it is good value for money. It shipped fast, but I do not this it was a good value at all
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Jax

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Super easy to use. The app works fantastic with it. I was missing the remote, emailed the company and they sent it out the next day. Customer service was quick to reply and they were great to deal with. I am using the Teleprompter for a video purposes. It has made a huge difference in the quality of the videos. I am very very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Secrist

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. I struggled with the remote to only learn that the battery was bad. Once I changed the battery, I was good. Be sure to turn on the mirror feature or your words will be backwards. Very portable. My only recommendation is to find a way to eliminate the sound on the remote. The clicking is distracting. I liked it so much that my hubby is buying one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sharlolanda Rice-ambrose

customer_reviews.title: Works Great - Expect it to Break Soon
customer_reviews.text: So far it has worked pretty well. The app has given me no problems and the remote seems to work fine. Pleasantly surprised. It loses a star because for $100, the housing needs to be metal, not cheap plastic. It's just a matter of time until it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Marginally Educated Reader

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use and transport and the price point is ...
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and transport and the price point is great. This gem has made our video shoots at least 10 times more efficient. Plus, there hasn't been any reduction in image quality as a result of using it.
customer_reviews.author: Nate K.

customer_reviews.title: Ok product.
customer_reviews.text: This product is ok but I just wish that they had a better way to keep the phone secured in the teleprompter. I wanted this to be great I really did.
customer_reviews.author: Demic

customer_reviews.title: This is a great piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Super simple to use and has made all the difference in the world as it pertains to producing spokesperson style videos.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Hartwig

customer_reviews.title: Not best used with a plus sized device
customer_reviews.text: Not best used with a plus sized device. Application is not the most elegant or easy to use. For the price, it does enough.
customer_reviews.author: E. Browne

customer_reviews.title: Easy to do YouTube videos that require a script!
customer_reviews.text: I have a YouTube channel and this teleprompter helps me to get videos done quickly. The hardest part is figuring out what size and speed you need to set the script on in order to get the perfect settings. Otherwise, it is great! Get the remote, too!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper in MD

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little helper
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little helper that I am using it on a weekly base! My camera is a Nikon DSLR but you can use any camera/lens that has a lens filter thread. As script player I have an old iPhone and sometimes deploy my Droid device. I took the prompter with me when traveling Australia. Carry-on luggage on a long haul flight, all went fine. If you are serious in using a small prompter, this one is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hostettler

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for work and we love it! It's so convenient
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for work and we love it! It's so convenient. The one improvement I would suggest to the creators is to maybe have something to better secure the phone (or other device) in place so it doesn't move if someone bumps it.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Williams

customer_reviews.title: This is a great, inexpensive way to get all the perks of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, inexpensive way to get all the perks of a teleprompter in a light-weight, easy to use package.
customer_reviews.author: QW

customer_reviews.title: Invaluable and well equipped for the price
customer_reviews.text: Invaluable and such a great teleprompter for only $99 defiantly recommend this. Very well built and has the remote and all fitments for any camera.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Murrell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product,.bad remote design
customer_reviews.text: The remote makes a audible click when using it that can be heard in the recording.
customer_reviews.author: Lovelylady

customer_reviews.title: The teleprompter itself works well and is highly portable. ...
customer_reviews.text: The teleprompter itself works well and is highly portable. I wish it were wider for full sentences. The app is a little weird to use too, I wish it would accept Word documents rather than just plain text.
customer_reviews.author: jplev

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is an essential product for amateur video work. Especially, when you do not want to constantly look down at your speech or outline. I am enjoying this product more after each use. I would suggest you buy the bluetooth remote for another $20. This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Quincey

customer_reviews.title: Le teleprompter est tres bien, par contre le contact ...
customer_reviews.text: Le teleprompter est tres bien, par contre le contact technique est vraiment tres compliqué, voir meme impossible. Defaillance de l’application, et pas de réponse hot ligne. Impossible de commander les telecommandes proposées. J’ai du trouver d’autres telecommandes bluetooth. Josh n’assure pas de suivi avec les clients, c’est bien dommage.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanpaul L.

customer_reviews.title: A good deal
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, weight not a issue as far as camera mount goes, much lighter than large lenses. It's not flimsy, but treat it carefully, it is lightly constructed. Function is great, app is perfect, easy to load up scrpts.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD

customer_reviews.title: This was a great find. We produce lots of internet videos and ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great find. We produce lots of internet videos and needed something easier to set up for cue's. This did it. It's light, easy to use, and performs as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Rckyhurtado

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works so nice. The text is visible very clearly. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Vi

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I video tape my wife reading books for her granddaughter and this makes the process so much easier. It fits well on my camera and is sturdy. The only minor item is getting the script onto the phone app. It’s takes a little time but is worth it in the end
customer_reviews.author: Steve Cruickshank

customer_reviews.title: It has helped me a ton and made my videos look a lot better.
customer_reviews.text: I was actually really impressed when this arrived. It has helped me a ton and made my videos look a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: webbwerx

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: Weak, poorly put together, and cheap. You'll need something to put under the front of it to hold it together.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great as long as you're using it with a phone and not a tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Clubware

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Even though the reviews were great I was a bit sceptical about it, but I'm glad I bought it. Had to do 10 videos for my website, and there is no way I could have memorised all that stuff. Works well with my iPhone and attaches to my camera just fine, because it comes with a whole bunch of lens adapters. It doesn't look like you're reading a script because it's so compact. Just relax as you read. I saved my word documents as txt files in Dropbox and synced with the Parrot app. I adjusted the text where necessary to allow for places where I would pause for a breath. A very affordable lifesaver. Get it!
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: It's a fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: The glass popped out of our first Parrot Teleprompter after 2 years and we purchased another. This one is much better because it actually comes with the adapter rings.
customer_reviews.author: Montina Portis

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.  Amazing product.  Told all my friends.
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. Amazing product. Told all my friends. Saved my video production. 6 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Armando O.

customer_reviews.title: Such a blessing!
customer_reviews.text: This simple mini teleprompter has been a real blessing to own! Saves me soooo much time by having my talent be able to read instead of memorizing everything!
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: Effective DSLR teleprompter
customer_reviews.text: This item is a major problem solver. It's easy to use and the app is free and effective. It gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory M. Brown

customer_reviews.title: It works, but it's super-cheaply made. It's basically ...
customer_reviews.text: It works, but it's super-cheaply made. It's basically just a cheap plastic lens covering w/ a slanted mirror and a clasp on the bottom to hold your phone. Sure, it has a bunch of adapters to fit every camera/camcorder lens, but $99 for a tiny mirror and plastic shell? Since I needed a small teleprompter for a rushed project, I got this & the remote. If given a chance, I'd buy a different one, at least something that looks a bit more sturdy/professional.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Sub-par Reflections for a $100 Teleprompter
customer_reviews.text: It's still legible, but there's a double-reflection on-screen. Shouldn't exist in a $100 plastic box. I run a YouTube channel with over 300,000 subscribers, and this was a great portable option.
customer_reviews.author: Science Studio

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This was a great investment. I did end up buying the remote. It also works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: sandy valentin

customer_reviews.title: was able to see it from a better distance than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed, was able to see it from a better distance than I thought. Can read it easily at 8ft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Content Creator!
customer_reviews.text: If you film at lot of content, this teleprompter is a life saver! I use this with my Iphone 6s Plus. Just download the free app and its seamless. (This also pairs well with any DLSR camera.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Decent for Pretty Basic
customer_reviews.text: The app is OK. Gets the job done for YouTube Videos. Definitely aids in cutting time on mistakes.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Salazar

customer_reviews.title: In the frame
customer_reviews.text: It’s in the frame with my Sony a6600 with a Sigma 16mm.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: overpriced for its quality but there's no alternatives to it.. That's why I bought it..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Thing Works As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. It works as advertised. You need to download the app to your smartphone and you're ready-to-go.
customer_reviews.author: David Tate

customer_reviews.title: Small. Not bad. Not good.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product. Does what it says. Very small and only useful at short distances. A bit pricey for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - awesome quality - easy to use
customer_reviews.text: happy to recommend to anyone who cannot remember their lines in front of camera!
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: All round excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't have made my videos without the Parrot. It saved so much time. I heartily recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: ErinHeadley

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great little product. Quality and build are great and works as advertised. An asset to my video process.
customer_reviews.author: Philip A.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased. I use it frequently in a corporate setting
customer_reviews.text: Extremely pleased. I use it frequently in a corporate setting. The remote (purchased separately) makes adjusting the speed of the copy very easy. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Williams

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’d like information to return this item. No what I was looking for, disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Love to shop

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVED IT!! Perfect for his Hunting Television show. I am the best wife ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Worth the cost. It could be a little easier to control the speed of the scroll, but other than that, it's a great product that has worked well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Must handle with care. Would be neat if it had a carrying bag to hold it.
customer_reviews.author: Roshotta

customer_reviews.title: Works - better if your close.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Though it's best if your pretty close - it's obviously not a huge teleprompter so the words are rather small.
customer_reviews.author: V. S. Quinnell

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: it makes difference! just be careful as it is a load on the lens so maybe autofocus will not perform properly
customer_reviews.author: Asem Sallam

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent application, the "glass" feels plasticky. The whole item feels plasticky, and I'm sure it won't survive a drop.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Teleprompter
customer_reviews.text: Great way to add a teleprompter to your bag of video tricks
customer_reviews.author: Helen G

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price and fairly simple to navigate.
customer_reviews.author: Carla R.

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, no complaints
customer_reviews.text: It's a teleprompter that uses your phone. it's good stuff. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Schwarcz

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Material is ok but it works well for what I needed it for
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool and design
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says it does and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: alexander salas

customer_reviews.title: Great as is
customer_reviews.text: I just learned that the Parrot 2 is now available after receiving the 1st. I was going to return the P1 and buy the P2 for same price from another vendor. But I decided the P1 is already perfect for what I need. Maybe when the P3 comes around I will but that in addition to the original. This is such a huge time saver for my horror host show.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin D Wilmoth

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Looks great but can't believe it's nearly 100$.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Fairbanks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Client is so very happy with this item. Easy to use, brilliant design.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Crazy Scott

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the Parrot Teleprompter. I like that it's portability and easy setup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Portable, economical and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Functions as described. A little difficult to slide phone into, but overall a great teleprompter!
customer_reviews.author: P Smith

customer_reviews.title: Super simple, easy to use - the app works ...
customer_reviews.text: Super simple, easy to use - the app works pretty well. Tiny = easy to pack in my camera bag. Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Dempster

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Working with GH5, Crane 2, Huawei mate 8. Thank you Parrot :). Greetings from Poland!
customer_reviews.author: Mariusz

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure I would be able to get enough distance due to the small size of the screen (smartphone), but it projects extremely well. Choice of different backgrounds for contrast and text size + speed. The text editor is easy and organized. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit without an extra adapter I had to buy, hard to squeeze the phone in it too!
customer_reviews.text: It works but in my case I had to buy an additional adapter. It should mention which cameras it does and does not work with. My camera is actually very common which is Sony a6000 and I"m surprised I had to buy an extension and pay extra money for it. Also, the springs are kinna tough so it takes some energy to squeeze the phone in there without damaging it.
customer_reviews.author: Aleks Nevski

customer_reviews.title: Careful of wide angle lenses
customer_reviews.text: Note that if you use wide angle lenses, it may not work. Works with 24mm lenses on a cropped body. Personally, I think this product is a bit expensive for what it is. Good build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Wildo!

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for large, wide angle lenses
customer_reviews.text: Honestly a fantastic product, but buyer beware! It does not work for large, wide angle lenses. I have a large zoom lens that I had set to 28 mm and the edges of the prompter were visible. Other than that, works great.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Kang

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Can't figure out how to use an iphone to record with it. Very small.
customer_reviews.author: JodifromMN

customer_reviews.title: Can't be used with every camera
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed the Parrot teleprompter can't be used with a Nikon Coolpix L340 (Amazon's Choice), for example, and there are other models that have this limitation as well. This is mentioned nowhere in the product's description. It's very unfortunate the company did not disclose this fact. I may have to ask for my money back if I can't tweak the teleprompter to work with my current setup.
customer_reviews.author: JMPP

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste time and money. It only can play the script BACKWARDS!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Would be a good product if the remote and software sold by the same company worked. It never worked correctly even after talking to support twice. Always played the script BACKWARDS!!!!!!!!!!!!! No way to correct it. Support says it will be fixed in September update. Then why sell this piece of crap now?????????
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: The Padcaster Parrot Teleprompter Kit, Portable Teleprompter for iPhone
feature_bullets: ON-THE-GO: Transform your smartphone into a professional, lightweight, and mobile teleprompter. With easy-to-read text displayed on a quality 30R/70T beam splitter glass screen, your video productions will always be professional.

COMPATIBILITY: The Padcaster Parrot Teleprompter works with any smartphone and can be mounted to almost any DSLR camera, plus other Padcaster products such as the Padcaster for iPad and Padcaster Verse for smartphones.

UNMATCHED VERSATILITY: Easily mount The Padcaster Parrot Teleprompter by attaching directly to the lens filter thread of almost any camera. Additional accessories may also be used with the Parrot for more professional results.
USER-FRIENDLY TECHNOLOGY: The free Padcaster Parrot app is easy to use with your cell phone and is compatible with both iOS and Android.
WIRELESS SOLUTION: The Padcaster Parrot Teleprompter comes with a Bluetooth Remote so you can pause, play, and adjust speed remotely.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars222 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
